result.title: A Language Change Detection Suite
result.description: We will collect previously developed methods (partially by the partners) applied to CH data in combination with models from D4.1 This basic system is used for further research to advance the technologies, with full results included in the deliverable.

result.title: Interactive Text Mining Environment (v.2)
result.description: More advanced methods for text mining are added to the interactive text mining environment during the project—and the environment improves—based on user feedback. The results and the corresponding evaluation results (using D4.3) will be reported here.

result.title: Common vocabularies
result.description: The report discusses the vocabularies used in the data sources and outlines potential established candidate vocabularies to link only highlevel concepts In close cooperation with WP1 these candidate vocabularies are discussed in relation to the user practices Finally it explains the resources chosen for deeper harmonization and includes the vocabularies as commented SKOS files The vocabularies are published open access

result.title: LOD data evaluation results (v.2)
result.description: This report will evaluate the consolidated graph in the knowledge base for i) how well it reflects the data present in the original data sources, ii) how much new data was created and iii) how accurate the data is. The final version will include the evaluation results by domain experts from the consortium partners and will be published open access.
